txt.en: You have been tasked with exploring a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'We have recently unlocked the hidden vault of Agbash-khalt. With the treasure vault open, it now must be explored!

'You are to travel to the vault of Agbash-khalt at once and find out what lies within. Careful though, as we do not know how safe the inner sanctum of the vault is!'

'Behold! The vault of Agbash-khalt, sealed and hidden to all those who have occupied Gundabad, has now finally revealed itself to the Zhélruka Dwarves….\n\n'Your mission is to explore a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.'
A puzzling device prevents you from retrieving what you are after and must be solved.
Your mission is to explore a recently uncovered dwarf-vault in Gundabad.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel.

'I have received word of your efforts at Agbash-khalt, [placeholder].\n\n'There was a trap in the vault that locked you inside! I am glad that you kept your wits about you and figured out how to escape! If you had panicked, I dare say the outcome might have been quite grim. Well done!'
